name: Bincom ICT Solutions
title: Front End Developer
summary: Bincom ICT Solutions is an established web services company with a track record of delivering great looking and diverse web projects. We are looking for Front End Software Engineer who is a specialist in front end development with a data-driven, user-centric mindset. You are passionate about designing front-end software systems and you enjoy the challenge of creating clean, elegant, scalable code in a complex environment. You are a master in HTML and CSS and use your expertise to solve complex problems while looking ahead to the bigger picture. You have a good sense of humor, your own philosophies, and a bright outlook.
description: We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

role: Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders

skill: Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as  SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git

about: We are a solid team with meaningful startup experience (including scaling up and acquisitions), realistic expectations, and good vibes. The founding team is strong, has experience working remote, and has serious expertise in the event industry, software development, bussiness and marketing.

name: Softcom
title: Backend Developer
summary: We are looking for an experienced Back-end developer to join our IT team. You will be responsible for the server side of our web applications. If you have excellent programming skills and a passion for developing applications or improving existing ones, we would like to meet you.
description: As a Back-end developer, you’ll work closely with our engineers to ensure system consistency and improve user experience. Ultimately, you should be able to develop and maintain functional and stable web applications to meet our company’s needs

role: Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
